statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(basename "$cwd"); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2mgit:%s\033[0m | \033[2m%s\033[0m" "$project" "$branch" "$style"
